mapper.insert: insert into post_message (writer, reciever, title, content, category) values (#{writer}, #{reciever}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category})
mapper.select: SELECT pm.idx, wm.nickname as writer_nickname, rm.nickname as reciever_nickname, pm.title, pm.content, pm.category, pm.result, pm.date_column FROM post_message pm JOIN member wm ON pm.writer = wm.idx join member rm on pm.reciever = rm.idx WHERE pm.reciever = #{idx} or pm.writer = #{idx}
